DOC.HEADLINE: LICENSE_PLATE HOLDER SALES TO BENEFIT ARTS
DOC.TEXT: Artist Wayne Thiebaud has collaborated with San Diego ' s Visual Asylum to design a license_plate holder that reads " State_of_the_Arts " in bold white letters on a deep blue background . The holder was commissioned by the California Confederation for the Arts and proceeds will support campaigns for increased arts education and funding for the arts . The holder sells for $ 12 and can be used with regular license_plates or with California Arts Council arts plates also designed by Thiebaud and available from the Department of Motor_Vehicles . Information : ( 916 ) 447-7811 .
